nodes.bodyText: Now that you're waiting for the job to be closed we shouldn't need to loop here.  By the time the job is closed it should have written all results it's ever going to write.

Now that our indices are hidden this won't be refreshing them.  The assertBusy will be masking this at the moment, but I think that should be removed and it's sometimes waiting a second unnecessarily.  We only need it to refresh .ml-anomalies-*, so might as well specify this in the refresh.
